ygData.subject: Bards on test server?
ygData.msgSnippet: Over the weekend I started a Bard on the test server.  I have to say the wide open spaces are nice, zoned into West Karana and I was the only one there :)  The
ygData.messageBody:
Over the weekend I started a Bard on the test server. I have to say the
wide open spaces are nice, zoned into West Karana and I was the only one
there :) The highest level Bard I have seen (via /w bard all) has been 18th
level. Anyone else out there playing a Bard on Test? Would be nice to have
a partner, I am currently 5th level and in the Qeynos area.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
